channel.title: Colonialism on Guy James
channel.description: Recent content in Colonialism on Guy James

item.title: Rock Bottom
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: The recent article by Josh Ellis ‘Everyone I Know Is Brokenhearted which has apparently gone viral, seems to have struck a chord among large numbers of people seriously disaffected by the current state of affairs in which we find ourselves. I also read a moving companion piece in A counterpoint for the brokenhearted in which the author provides pays tribute to a friend who did everything he could to relieve the suffering of desperate people.
